languages.text: Схизма Прерывания Цикла охватила флот Осознание, и вскоре братоубийственная война была завершена. Презрев заветы предтеч, Эксплораторы вступили на опасную стезю нового постижения, творения и ревизии процедур и алгоритмов. Флот вновь был един, и в единстве своем он готов был взглянуть в лицо ужасам, преградой на пути которых стоял катехизис эксплуатации и обслуживания.
languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как амарнат или еретех

languages.text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.
languages.original_text: Схизма Прерывания Цикла охватила флот Осознание, и вскоре братоубийственная война была завершена. Презрев заветы предтеч, Эксплораторы вступили на опасную стезю нового постижения, творения и ревизии процедур и алгоритмов. Флот вновь был един, и в единстве своем он готов был взглянуть в лицо ужасам, преградой на пути которых стоял катехизис эксплуатации и обслуживания.

traits.locale_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the war on their own kin was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, Explorators stepped on a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to look at the face of any horrors, held at bay by the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance.

Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

languages.text: 终止循环所造成的分裂吞噬了整支真理开拓者舰队，但内战很快就结束了。开拓者们无视先人的训诫，踏上了危险的道路，致力于对已有程序和算法的全新理解、创造与修改。舰队再次团结起来，准备消灭一切违背《操作与维护原理》的恐怖之物。
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: 终止循环所造成的分裂吞噬了整支真理开拓者舰队，但内战很快就结束了。开拓者们无视先人的训诫，踏上了危险的道路，致力于对已有程序和算法的全新理解、创造与修改。舰队再次团结起来，准备消灭一切违背《操作与维护原理》的恐怖之物。

languages.text: Das Schisma der Unterbrechung des Zyklus erfasste die gesamte Erkenntnisflotte, und bald war der Bürgerkrieg vorüber. Die Exploratoren ignorierten die Gebote ihrer Ahnen und schlugen einen gefährlichen Pfad neuer Erkenntnis ein, neuer Schöpfung und neuer Revision von Prozeduren und Algorithmen. Die Flotte war wieder vereint, und in ihrer Einheit war sie bereit, jedem Horror entgegenzutreten, der dem Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung im Weg stand.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: Das Schisma der Unterbrechung des Zyklus erfasste die gesamte Erkenntnisflotte, und bald war der Bürgerkrieg vorüber. Die Exploratoren ignorierten die Gebote ihrer Ahnen und schlugen einen gefährlichen Pfad neuer Erkenntnis ein, neuer Schöpfung und neuer Revision von Prozeduren und Algorithmen. Die Flotte war wieder vereint, und in ihrer Einheit war sie bereit, jedem Horror entgegenzutreten, der dem Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung im Weg stand.

languages.text: Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle engloutit toute la Flotte de la Connaissance et la guerre civile prit fin peu après. Ignorant les commandements de leurs précurseurs, les Explorators s'aventurèrent sur un chemin dangereux de compréhension et de création nouvelles, tout en réformant leurs procédures et algorithmes. La flotte à nouveau unie était prête à affronter toutes les horreurs qui se dressaient sur la voie du Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle engloutit toute la Flotte de la Connaissance et la guerre civile prit fin peu après. Ignorant les commandements de leurs précurseurs, les Explorators s'aventurèrent sur un chemin dangereux de compréhension et de création nouvelles, tout en réformant leurs procédures et algorithmes. La flotte à nouveau unie était prête à affronter toutes les horreurs qui se dressaient sur la voie du Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance.

languages.text: El cisma de la Discontinuación del Ciclo envolvió a toda la Flota Conciencia, pero la guerra civil fue breve. Ignorando los mandamientos de sus predecesores, los exploradores trazaron un nuevo y peligroso camino de comprensión, creación y revisión de procedimientos y algoritmos. La flota quedó unida de nuevo, y, gracias a ello, estaba lista para enfrentarse a cualquier pesadilla que se interpusiera en el camino del Catequismo de la Operación y el Mantenimiento.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: El cisma de la Discontinuación del Ciclo envolvió a toda la Flota Conciencia, pero la guerra civil fue breve. Ignorando los mandamientos de sus predecesores, los exploradores trazaron un nuevo y peligroso camino de comprensión, creación y revisión de procedimientos y algoritmos. La flota quedó unida de nuevo, y, gracias a ello, estaba lista para enfrentarse a cualquier pesadilla que se interpusiera en el camino del Catequismo de la Operación y el Mantenimiento.

languages.text: 「サイクルを断ち切れ」の分裂はコグニサンス艦隊全体を巻き込み、やがて内戦は終結した。先祖の戒めを無視し、エクスプロレイターたちは新たな理解、創造、手順とアルゴリズムの改訂という危険な道を歩み始めた。艦隊は再び団結し、その団結の中で、整備と操作の要理の行く手を阻むいかなる恐怖にも立ち向かう準備が整った。
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: 「サイクルを断ち切れ」の分裂はコグニサンス艦隊全体を巻き込み、やがて内戦は終結した。先祖の戒めを無視し、エクスプロレイターたちは新たな理解、創造、手順とアルゴリズムの改訂という危険な道を歩み始めた。艦隊は再び団結し、その団結の中で、整備と操作の要理の行く手を阻むいかなる恐怖にも立ち向かう準備が整った。

languages.text: Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu anlayışı, tüm Malumat Filosu'nu içine çekti. Kısa süre sonra da iç savaş sona erdi. Atalarının emirlerini bir kenara bırakan Keşiftörler, prosedürlerin ve algoritmaların yeni bir idrak, yaratım ve revizyondan geçtiği, tehlikeli bir yolda ilerlemeye başladı. Filo bir kez daha tek yumruk oldu ve bu sayede de Faaliyet ve Bakım İlmihâli'nin yoluna çıkan dehşetlerin üstesinden gelmeye hazır hâle geldi.
languages.original_text: The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle engulfed the entire Cognisance Fleet, and soon the civil war was over. Disregarding the commandments of their forefathers, the Explorators started down a dangerous path of new comprehension, creation, and revision of procedures and algorithms. The fleet was united once more, and in its unity, it was ready to stare down any horrors standing in the way of the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation.

traits.locale_text: Döngü'nün Süreğini Bozma anlayışı tüm Malumat Filosu'nu içine çekti ve iç savaş kısa süre sonra sona erdi. Atalarının emirlerini bir kenara bırakan Keşiftörler, prosedürlerin ve algoritmaların yeni bir idrak, yaratım ve revizyondan geçtiği tehlikeli bir yolda ilerlemeye başladı. Filo bir kez daha tek yumruk oldu ve bu sayede de Faaliyet ve Bakım İlmihâli'nin yoluna çıkan dehşetlerin üstesinden gelmeye hazır hâle geldi.

languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как амарнат или еретех
